name: Crystal Hearts
description:
A "RPG with the power to control time" has now arrived!!
Achieving advanced balance in battles!

~ A story about a boy who dreamt to become a warrior, begins now. ~

* Game balance and contents optimized through overseas precedent launch, are now available to the US!

The “time-controlling RPG” has born!
* Fusion of tactic skills and real-time time-controlling action! 
* Each unit acts in real-time !
* Turn-based skills! Think carefully when it's your turn and use them strategically! 

The Fun of “Crystal Hearts”
* Solo play in “Adventure” mode, and enjoy both story and battle! 
* Attribute + skill + class = infinity! 
* Power up your units through Upgrade and Awaken! 
* All units are upgradable to 6-star! 
* A story about a boy who overcome difficulties with his friends and grow through battling with enemies. 
* Gorgeous attackers, handsome tanks, cute supporters, etc. There’s a lot of units waiting for you! 

Great Voice Actors:
* Frontline voice actors and actresses to heat up the battle with their awesome voices! 
* Realistic units’ battle voice overs that make you feel as if you are right in the scene! 
* Voice overs by Natsumi Muragami, Tomohito Takatsuka and others. 
* “Crystal Hearts” is free to play, but also contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish.

* Compatible Devices
iOS 9.0 or above/ iPhone 4s or above
